Summary: Traveling west above I-70 500 ft alt. doing 70 mph then stopped changed.
divs: sighting detailsmy wife & i were driving west on i-70 we were doing about 70 mph we looked up to the south and saw a diamond shaped craft bigger then a 747 jet it was 500 ft.above us staying right beside us it was well light up and had a row of windows along the side all of a sudden it changed shape it looked like two diamonds end to end bigger then two 747's i pulled over to watch it and it stopped and set there for a min.and all of a sudden it changed into a orange glowing solid diomond shape approx.80 ft.long and 50 ft. wide and took of it went from 500 ft.to space in less then 1\32 of a second it made a light trail the color of a rainbow in the shape of a upside down j it didn't make a sound we were beteen blue springs mo. and independence mo. we had been out in blue srings mo. looking for 2 meteorites that came down 2 weeks prior in the same area,my wife dont beleave in ufo's since then she has seen 3 up close,i have seen 6 ufo's 2 of them were 100 ft away 1 was sitting on the ground down by whiteman air force base it made its own fog when it left the fog left.i was afraid to touch it but i wanted to i was with 6 other guys we all had guns but still were afraid for some unknown reason it was sitting on three legs when it started to leave it slowly lifted up and the legs retracked it rotated counter clockwise and made a high pitched whine and left fast. {pid\cms\jat}
